messages.title: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: If you want to make a real difference, back me by voting for my candidate, Edward Argar, in your local constituency of Charnwood. You will have a say in a strong and stable government, that will deliver the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand, ensure economic security and prosperity.
Providing strong and stable leadership for Charnwood and Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter who you vote for in Charnwood constituency.

issues.brexitEurope: We will go to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand to ensure we guarantee our economic security.
issues.economy: With dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and build our country together - building a stronger economy and creating more secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Where every child gets a good school place and working people can buy a home.
issues.governance: This is a unique and crucial election for our country.
issues.government: In a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn negotiating Brexit.

community.content: Corbyn negotiating Brexit - which we would all pay for in higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.

images.caption: THERESA MAY AND EDWARD ARGAR - STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP FOR CHARNWOOD AND FOR BRITAIN
A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN

examples: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and it is central to your own security and prosperity.
We can make a success of Brexit and build our country together - building a stronger economy and creating more secure and well-paid jobs.
We will go to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand to ensure we guarantee our economic security.
It is nonsense to me that votes for Mr Corbyn’s local Labour candidate as a vote for or from locally doesn’t matter nationally.
back me by voting for my candidate, Edward Argar, in your local constituency of Charnwood.
Make Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter who you vote for in Charnwood constituency.
Labour plots Brexit deal with other parties if Tories don't win election majority.
A Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
